summary: A wealthy woman meets a bum on a park bench and marries him the same evening.

Mitchell|Louis Natheaux|William J. O'Brien|Garry Owen|Lee Phelps|Bob Reeves|Lillian Rich|Cyril Ring|Henry Roquemore|C.L. Sherwood|Carl Stockdale|Al Thompson|Bobby Watson|Josephine Whittell
title: Lucky Night
